body: The prose parts of that come from the python docstrings and other in-code documentation. For example, `/__version__` has a description of "Return data for developers and users to inspect the state of a server.", which comes from the docstring of the view associated with that endpoint, in [normandy/health/api/views.py](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/a9260bf30b235e3e6721d5b278e76993683d6096/recipe-server/normandy/health/api/views.py#L57)
